ComicInfo.Title: Life in Wartime!
ComicInfo.Summary: Life in Wartime!: After Teknight joins the Strangers to replace Atom Bob, the team goes their separate ways. Lady Killer and Yrial take Atom Bob to a European clinic for treatment. As Candy is starting Grenade's car, a bomb ignites from beneath it. She lives, but her android body is heavily damaged. Spectral, Zip Zap, Teknight and Grenade take her back to NuWare, kidnap J.D. Hunt, and use him as leverage to force his technicians to repair her.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-04-27 20:46:40. [CVDB105288] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-17 03:19:39. [Issue ID 235031]
